column5: Wife and I need a break , been some family related turmoil. Just need to get away for a week or two. Just her and I for a couple of weeks and the 2 cats  . And lots of privacy but she needs her wifi A cottage would be ideal but a lodge will do. Any ideas on we could get away? I stayed for a few days at Talisman Resort and thought it was  cool but  I see it is in receivership / tax sale  , we really need this , thanks

There are usually lots of cottages for rent here in Wasaga in winter. Blue mtn is quite close for skiing and we have a provincial park in town that has plenty of space for walking or snowshoeing. ( or XC skiing)
We are old , looking out a window is fine with us , quiet time is most important.
Haliburton has a few places too I would look into.
